Effect: Beacon.name: Effect: Beacon
Effect: Beacon.description: You can spend a single action to raise your deity's focus to grant allies within 15 feet a +1 status bonus against emotion effects. When you would become an expert in your deity’s favored weapon, you instead increase the range to 30 feet.

Effect: Cunning Fervor.name: Effect: Cunning Fervor
Effect: Cunning Fervor.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Acrobatics checks to Tumble Through and Deception checks to Feint

Effect: Daily Obedience.name: Effect: Daily Obedience
Effect: Daily Obedience.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.clerics.clerics-feats.xqIHI8M2w6Y6K3zK]{Daily Obedience}.

Once during the next 24 hours, when you roll your divine skill, you may roll twice and take the higher result. You must declare you are using this effect before you make the roll.

Effect: Divine Strategy.name: Effect: Divine Strategy
Effect: Divine Strategy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.clerics.clerics-feats.NPbsEdMz47jS7lHM]{Divine Strategy}.

If you critically succeed at the Recall Knowledge check, you notice a weakness and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll from Devise a Stratagem.

Effect: Elemental Fervor Damage.name: Effect: Elemental Fervor Damage
Effect: Elemental Fervor Damage.description: You gain a +1 status bonus against saves that have the trait of your chosen element and resistance equal to half your level against that damage type.

Effect: Elemental Fervor Saves.name: Effect: Elemental Fervor Saves
Effect: Elemental Fervor Saves.description:
• You gain a +1 status bonus against saves that have the trait of your chosen element and resistance equal to half your level against that damage type.
  • Your weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 damage of the element you selected. This damage increases by 1d4 for each additional damage die your weapon deals.

Effect: Excommunication.name: Effect: Excommunication
Effect: Excommunication.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.clerics.clerics-features.8QdGrCnqMfdSc3N5]{Excommunication}.

The creature takes a -2 status penalty to its saves against divine spells and to its divine spell attack rolls, and divine spell DCs until the end of your next turn, or for 1 minute if the attack was a critical success. Regardless of the result, the target is then immune to this effect for 10 minutes.

Effect: Fervor AC.name: Effect: Fervor AC
Effect: Fervor AC.description:
• You gain a +1 status bonus to your AC and to saves against mental effects.
  • Your weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 evil damage if you selected @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} as your divine font or 1d4 good damage if you selected @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}. This damage increases by 1d4 for each additional damage die your weapon deals.

Effect: Fervor Damage.name: Effect: Fervor Damage
Effect: Fervor Damage.description: Your weapon and unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 evil damage if you selected @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} as your divine font or 1d4 good damage if you selected @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal}. This damage increases by 1d4 for each additional damage die your weapon deals.

Effect: Fervor of Force Ghost Touch.name: Effect: Fervor of Force Ghost Touch
Effect: Fervor of Force Ghost Touch.description:
• Your wielded weapons gain the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} weapon property rune and you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against incorporeal creatures.
  • You gain resistance to force damage equal to half your level and a +2 status bonus against effects that cause forced movement.

Effect: Fervor of Force Resistance.name: Effect: Fervor of Force Resistance
Effect: Fervor of Force Resistance.description:
• Your wielded weapons gain the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} weapon property rune and you gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks against incorporeal creatures.
  • You gain resistance to force damage equal to half your level and a +2 status bonus against effects that cause forced movement.

Effect: Heraldic Statue.name: Effect: Heraldic Statue
Effect: Heraldic Statue.description: While your sacred animal is a statue, it can't take any actions except to use the same activity to transform back, and it can't defend itself easily, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} and giving it an additional –2 status penalty to its AC, but gains resistance 5 to all damage. While in this form, all allies within 30 feet receive a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and to saves against mental effects. Creatures that oppose your deity or are considered enemies of your deity have a -1 status penalty to their AC and Will saves while within 30 feet of your sacred animal.

Effect: Heraldic Statue (Aura).name: Effect: Heraldic Statue (Aura)
Effect: Heraldic Statue (Aura).description: While in this form, all allies within 30 feet receive a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and to saves against mental effects.

Effect: Heroic Recovery+.name: Effect: Heroic Recovery+
Effect: Heroic Recovery+.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.KR78kinMmAZQHeoa]{Heroic Recovery}

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{Heal} targeting a single living creature and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains three bonuses until the end of its next turn: a +5-foot status bonus to its Speed, a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, and a +1 status bonus to damage rolls.

At 16th level, the status bonus to speed increases to a +10-foot status bonus and the status bonus to damage rolls increases to +4.

Effect: Overpowering Fervor.name: Effect: Overpowering Fervor
Effect: Overpowering Fervor.description: You gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks to Force Open, Grapple, and Shove.
